resources.string: MAIN ACTIVITY SCREEN: This screen displays the categories by which users can sort and play their music. When clicking on each of the categories (Music, Artists or Playlists), a new activity with a list of Songs, Artists or Playlists opens. When clicking on the Buy New Bundles button, users are redirected to Paypal where they can purchase new app bundles.

SONGS ACTIVITY: This screen shows a list of all the songs on the user\'s device, using a custom ArrayAdapter. When the user clicks on a song, a NowPlaying screen opens, showing details about the song. Placeholder images will be replaced with Album covers.

ARTISTS ACTIVITY: This screen shows a list of all the artists on the user\'s phone, using a custom ArrayAdapter. When the user clicks on an artist, the NowPlaying activity opens and the first song of that artist\'s discography starts playing. Placeholder images will be replaced with Artist Pictures.

PLAYLISTS ACTIVITY: This screen shows a list of all playlists. When the user clicks on an playlist, the NowPlaying activity opens and the first song of that playlist starts playing. Placeholder images will be replaced with Album covers.

NOW PLAYING ACTIVITY: This screen shows details of the song that is currently playing including album cover, title, artist name, options to skips to previous/next songs and the length of the song. The user can go back to the Main Activity or the list of songs by pressing the home or list buttons

PAYMENT ACTIVITY: Shows a list of extensions that can be added to the App (i.e. : additional bundles of music). When users click on buy now, they can pay using PayPal API https://developer.paypal.com/docs/classic/mobile/ht_mpl-itemPayment-Android/
